entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 04:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -18.3°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
